description: Try our easy to follow Activia Probiotic Mixed Berry Smoothie Bowl recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Smoothie bowl,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Egg free,Peanut free
name: Activia Probiotic Mixed Berry Smoothie Bowl Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 250g Activia Probiotic No Added Sugar Mixed Berry Yoghurt pots

recipeInstructions.text: In a blender, combine the yoghurt and coconut water until smooth and pour into a bowl.
Sprinkle the remaining ingredients on top of the smoothie and serve immediately.
